Could you please get in touch with the <nowiki>[[MOTU]]</nowiki> guys on <code>#ubuntu-motu</code>? We have a process for getting new packages in and we'd like to have packages in '''one''' place. Thanks for your work on those packages, but I think, getting them in ''the normal way'' is better for everybody. Thanks, DanielHolbach

== Intro ==
A place to post links to User Contributed Debs for Ubuntu.

<pre>
 mkdir -p /usr/local/pkg
 cd /usr/local/pkg
 wget ${SITE}/${APP}-${VER}.deb
 dpkg -i /usr/local/pkg/${APP}-${VER}.deb

 dpkg -r ${PACKAGE}-${VER}
</pre>
